description.en:
ChilliSwap is a DEX (Decentralized exchange) platform and ecosystem for users to trade tokens, yield farm/stake, and is also a Fine Art NFT digital marketplace.

ChilliSwap is a decentralized platform that combines a fine art NFT marketplace, token exchange and NFT gaming in one ecosystem. ChilliSwap enables peer-to-peer transfers while adhering to tight security guidelines and offering AI-based analytical tools to detect fraud.
